attributes.action: Tax at 100% any additional profits made by Utilities through phasing out quarterly charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A phasing out of an allowance to pay quarterly, even if one has good payment references, will be introduced before long by BT and other utilities.
This is against the idiom of ''whichever way I choose to pay as long as its on time'' accepted in the past.
